item.title: [GRA11][Public Cloud] - Instances maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 27, 08:00 - 10:00 UTC

May 7, 21:08 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Public Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 27/05/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 27/05/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Some instances will be temporarily unavailable for approximately 15 minutes during the operation. Although the actual downtime may vary, our team is committed to minimising the impact and will work diligently to restore services as quickly as possible.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a some operations on some instances in GRA11.
Affected customers will receive a support ticket with additional details regarding the scheduled maintenance.

Thank you for your understanding.

May 15, 06:56 UTC

Please find the details:

End Time : 15/05/2025 06:38 UTC
Root cause : The incident was due to a software issue.
Service impact : MKS manager and api services in WAW1 were unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our team has resolved this incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [UK1][Storage] - Volume Snapshot incident notification
item.description:

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

May 15, 00:36 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

May 15, 00:35 UTC

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

May 15, 00:24 UTC
Update - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Storage offering, which is causing temporary Availability issues in the region UK1.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 14/05/2025 20:46 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The creation or access to the CEPH volume is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Clients are temporarily unable to create or access their volumes in the affected region.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

May 15, 00:17 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Compute - Instance offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [EU][Storage] - LocalZones incident notification
item.description:
May 12, 08:55 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our LocalZones Storage offer in EU except for EU-SOUTH-LZ-MAD and EU-WEST-LZ-BRU has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 11/05/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 12/05/2025 08:42 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

May 12, 08:41 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our LocalZones Storage offer in EU except for EU-SOUTH-LZ-MAD and EU-WEST-LZ-BRU.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 11/05/2025 21:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Management of LocalZones VMs is temporarily impacted.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to create, stop and start VMs in the specified regions.
Already running VMs are not impacted by the incident.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
